sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ({ value, text, rate_color }) => { return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { rate_color: '#f8e825' } Rating.propTypes = { value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, rate_color: PropTypes.string.isRequired } export default Rating
